message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be a valuable asset to you. I'm asking for $22,000  to start negotiations. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  $12,000 is quite a bit lower than I'm hoping for. Could you do $19,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but $19,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $14,000. Can we meet in the middle?
